import React from 'react'; export default function CreateBreed(){ let [input,setInput] = React.useState({ name:"", max_height:0, min_height:0, max_weight:0, min_weight:0, max_life:0, min_life:0, temperaments: [], }) let handleChange= (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); setInput((prev) => ({...prev,[e.target.value]:e.target.value})) } return(
